00034 #ifndef _error_h_
00035 #define _error_h_
00036 
00037 
00038 #define SUCCESS           0
00039 
00040 /* Generic errors */
00041 #define ERROR             -1
00042 #define INVALID_ARGUMENT  -2
00043 #define NOT_SUPPORTED     -3
00044 
00045 
00046 /* USART */
00047 #define USART_SUCCESS 0
00048 #define USART_FAILURE -1
00049 #define USART_INVALID_INPUT 1
00050 #define USART_INVALID_ARGUMENT -1
00051 
00052 #define USART_TX_BUSY           -200
00053 #define USART_RX_EMPTY          -201
00054 #define USART_RX_ERROR          -202
00055 #define USART_MODE_FAULT        -203
00056 #define USART_ADDR_RECEIVED     -204
00057 
00058 #endif
